name: Puxian Baozigou Coal Mine
company_mentions: Shanxi Coal Import and Export Group Puxian Baozigou Coal Industry Co Ltd

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.gem.wiki/%E5%B1%B1%E8%A5%BF%E7%85%A4%E7%82%AD%E8%BF%9B%E5%87%BA%E5%8F%A3%E9%9B%86%E5%9B%A2%E8%92%B2%E5%8E%BF%E8%B1%B9%E5%AD%90%E6%B2%9F%E7%85%A4%E4%B8%9A%E6%9C%89%E9%99%90%E5%85%AC%E5%8F%B8. The Puxian Baozigou Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in the village of Niangou, Heilongguan Town, Pu County, Linfen City, Shanxi Province

operators: Shanxi Coal Import and Export Group Puxian Baozigou Coal Industry Co Ltd
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Shanxi Coal Import and Export Group and owned by Shanxi Coking Coal Group.
